name: The Modern Writer
description: Welcome fellow writer to my Notion template! Let me introduce you to the ultimate writer's workspace with a bit of backstory.A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away... there was a huge lack of specialized tools for writers. Having tried everything, from classics like InDesign to more creative products like Scrivener, I always felt like something was missing.
